isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - FRONT DRIVE AXLE: SPICER S-9000 - INSTALLATION OF CARRIER ASSEMBLY INTO AXLE HOUSING

svcproc.title: INSTALLATION OF CARRIER ASSEMBLY INTO AXLE HOUSING

step1.para: Thoroughly clean inside of axle housing. Stone the housing mounting surface if necessary to remove burrs or nicks.
Apply Loctite #518 gasket eliminator to axle housing at carrier mounting flange. A 1/4 inch bead around the outside of all carrier mounting bolts and each bolt hole is required ( Figure 59).

figure.caption: Figure 59. 1/4 Inch Bead Loctite to Flange

step1.para: Thread 2 studs 180 degrees apart into the axle housing as an installation aid.
Install carrier assembly into axle housing. Install washer. Tighten bolts to 56 to 62 ft-lbs. (76 to 84 Nm). Bolts must be cleaned and coated with Loctite #277, or its equivalent ( Figure 60).
